text: Steve Eduardo Makuka Pereyra (born 26 November 1994) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a defender for Atlético Bucaramanga in the Categoría Primera A. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at FOX Sports Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:River Plate Montevideo players Category:Montevideo City Torque players Category:Huracán F.C. players Category:Progreso players Category:Liverpool F.C. title: Steve Makuka
